member.name: T:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.PostgreSql.Net.Api.Exceptions.InvalidColumnTypeForBooleanValueException
member.summary: Thrown when the read database column is neither boolean nor integer.

remarks.para: When using with the the column to read must be either boolean or integer. It the type is integer, "0" is equivalent to false and anything except "0" is true.
This exception is identified by error code HK12011.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.PostgreSql.Net.Api.Exceptions.InvalidColumnTypeForBooleanValueException.EquivalentHttpStatusCode
member.summary: If this error occurs while processing an HTTP request, the request should be terminated with a status code 500 (Internal Server Error).

member.name: T:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.PostgreSql.Net.Api.Exceptions.PostgreSqlException
member.summary: All PostgreSql related exceptions are thrown within this class.
member.remarks: These exceptions should not be thrown by code outside this module.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.PostgreSql.Net.Properties.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.PostgreSql.Net.Properties.Strings.InvalidColumnTypeForBooleanValueExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type of a requested column is '{0}' which cannot be translated into a boolean value..
